text: The 1983 African Women's Handball Championship was the fifth edition of the African Women's Handball Championship, held from 23 to 30 July 1983 at the Cairo International Stadium and the Police Arena in Cairo, Egypt. ==Draw== {| class="wikitable" !width=195px|Group A !width=195px|Group B |- |valign=top| |valign=top| |} ==Preliminary round== ===Group A=== {| class=wikitable style="text- align:center" width=500 |- !
